mapper.insert: insert into memberStock(member_id, predict_id) select #{memberId}, #{predictId} from dual where not exists( select member_id, predict_id from memberStock where member_id=#{memberId} and predict_id = #{predictId})
mapper.select: select m.id, member_id, predict_day, predict_graph, predict_id, predict_month, predict_year, stock_name, stock_yesterday from memberStock m join predict p on m.predict_id = p.id join stock s on m.predict_id = s.id where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete from memberStock where member_id=#{memberId} and predict_id=#{predictId};
